recipe.notes: **UNTRIED** My mom would make up a few of these and freeze 'em in advance.  I remember at times the tortilla layer  kinda freaked me out but its a kind of fun oldschool casserole.
recipe.name: Tortilla Pie
recipe.preparation: Brown hamburger and onion together in skillet.  Combine other ingredients (except olives, tortillas and cheese) with meat.  Arrange a layer of tortillas on the bottom of casserole.  Put half of the sauce in a layer and top with chopped olives and grated cheese.  Next put in another layer of tortillas and repeat as above.  Bake at 325º for 30 minutes.
